name: Unknown (Gw1p)
description:
Ever wanted to shoot some monsters in space? Download Unknown, pick up a gun and go!

This short game is set up in space, where your goal is to clear the level of monsters. Watch out, as your health and ammo are limited!

I hope you will enjoy this little game I've been working on. Buggy and glitchy here and there, but made all by myself :)

Right now there are only 5 levels available, but there are more to come!

If you want to report a bug, or just to talk about games - comment, send an e-mail to gw1p@mail.ru or reach out to me on Twitter @AntonGw1p
